metadata.Title: CVE-2019-7314 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: liblivemedia in Live555 before 2019.02.03 mishandles the termination of an RTSP stream after RTP/RTCP-over-RTSP has been set up, which could lead to a Use-After-Free error that causes the RTSP server to crash (Segmentation fault) or possibly have unspecified other impact. It was discovered that liveMedia incorrectly handled certain RTSP streamings. An attacker could possiby use this issue to cause a denial of service or other unspecified impact.

criterions.comment: liblivemedia: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
